skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end development creates website and app visuals users interact with. It involves UI design, responsive layouts, and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to enhance user experience. Front-end developers ensure seamless, user-friendly design across devices and browsers.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Back-end development oversees the server-side of web apps, handling logic, data, and communication between front-end and databases. It ensures secure, efficient, and reliable app functionality, including data management, user authentication, server settings, and APIs, vital for app performance.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI/UX design creates visually appealing and user-friendly digital experiences. UI focuses on product aesthetics and interactive elements, while UX optimizes the user journey for efficiency and enjoyment. UI and UX designers collaborate to deliver cohesive, user-centric digital solutions.

skills.title: Webflow Dvelopment
skills.description: Webflow development simplifies website creation by providing a visual interface for designing and building responsive, feature-rich websites without extensive coding.

portfolio.title: Todo App
portfolio.description: A Todo App, short for 'To-Do Application,' is a simple and efficient tool designed to help users organize tasks and manage their daily activities.
